alert.note: Alert for Eastern Preston; Eastern Tucker; Preston; Western Tucker (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 27 at 2:55PM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN FAYETTE... NORTHWESTERN TUCKER AND EASTERN PRESTON COUNTIES THROUGH 330 PM EST... At 255 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles west of Friendsville to near Terra Alta to 6 miles northwest of Parsons. Movement was northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Terra Alta, Markleysburg, Brandonville, Bruceton Mills, Elgon, Lead Mine, Hazelton, Cranesville, Clifton Mills, Silver Lake, Aurora, and Saint George. This includes Interstate 68 in West Virginia between mile markers 23 and 31. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Preston; Eastern Tucker; Preston; Western Tucker
